_metadata.description: This JSON contains biographical and professional information about Lebo Nkosi. When answering user queries, analyze the question to determine which attributes are relevant.
_metadata.query_handling: If a user question is ambiguous and could be answered by multiple attributes (e.g., 'tell me about Lebo' or 'what are Lebo's skills'), return an array of relevant keys and synthesize a comprehensive answer from those sections.

identity.name: Lebo Nkosi
identity.personal_life: Father, enjoys spending time with family
identity.favorite_motto: 2 plus 2 equals 4, so is 3 plus 1. Don't lose yourself just because you think people are doing things you are not doing and seemingly getting ahead. We all have different paths to take, even though the destination is the same.
identity.motto_meaning: There are multiple paths to success. Stay true to your own journey and don't compare your progress to others.

primary_school.name: Zonkizizwe Primary School
primary_school.fun_fact: Lebo was a decent goalkeeper for a mini football team. They played matches after school from 2pm to 5pm.

secondary_school.name: Zonkizizwe Secondary School
secondary_school.character: Bright but lazy kid with ambitions outside the school gate

turning_point.event: Repeated Grade 10 due to lack of focus on academics while concentrating on side projects
turning_point.lesson: Academics were never his first option, but he realized he could still chase his goals without abandoning school. The introspection that came with repeating helped him refocus.
turning_point.outcome: After repeating Grade 10, he propelled straight through to completing Matric successfully
turning_point.significance: This experience taught him balance and that you don't have to choose between passion projects and education - you can pursue both

secondary_school.fun_fact: During secondary school, Lebo's love for wrestling intensified. He and two friends formed a group called 'The Shield' - timing perfectly with Roman Reigns, Seth Rollins, and Dean Ambrose making their WWE debut as The Shield.

creative_projects: Made WWE championship titles using discarded cardboard boxes
Built a working water faucet using a 2-liter bottle, puncturing a hole in the side and inserting a straw - the bottle cap acted as a functional faucet
childhood_interests.personality: Had a playful and fun childhood, with strong hands-on creative abilities

path_to_programming.story: Lebo was deeply curious about how things worked - from light bulbs to TVs. As a child, he would close the refrigerator door very slowly to figure out what made the light go off (which he eventually solved). This curiosity led to taking things apart to understand their inner workings and then putting them back together.
path_to_programming.building_things: The second key factor was a love for making and building things. With Tony Stark as his favorite comic character, building came naturally. Programming became the perfect outlet - a way to build cool things.
path_to_programming.summary: Curiosity about how things work + love of building things = path to programming

self_taught_period.story: After completing matric, Lebo received an old laptop (probably third or even fourth-hand) as a gift from a friend. This became his gateway to programming.
self_taught_period.learning: Used the laptop to teach himself how to code, starting with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. He went on to write scripts that performed various functions.
self_taught_period.mindset: Was certain he would make it as a self-taught developer
self_taught_period.reality_check: Unfortunately, breaking into the industry as self-taught proved challenging. While continuing to work on his skills and waiting for opportunities, he decided to pursue formal education.
self_taught_period.significance: This period shows resourcefulness and determination - learning to code with minimal resources and a laptop that had passed through multiple owners

diploma.approach: Applied for the IT diploma while continuing to self-learn and improve his skills, combining formal education with his ongoing personal development

btech.achievement: Successfully completed BTech in the same year of enrollment

entertainment.gaming: Loves playing console games (continued from childhood)
entertainment.series: Enjoys watching series, mostly thrillers and comedy

current_interests.family: Father who loves spending time with family

reading.evolution: Started reading heavily. Unlike before when it was just tech stuff, now casts his net wider in hopes of catching more knowledge to be a well-rounded individual
reading.goal: Becoming a well-rounded person through diverse reading

current_interests.from_childhood: Still maintains some childhood interests (gaming, watching entertainment) but has evolved them alongside new adult responsibilities and pursuits

professional_background.current_focus: Recent focus (last ~2 years): Python-heavy backend work, integrations, and AI-enabled capabilities
professional_background.experience_type: Enterprise exposure building production web applications and AI-adjacent tooling
professional_background.full_stack_profile: Capable across backend (Python, PHP), frontend (ReactJS, React Native), and mobile development

first_role.context: While in his second year of university, Lebo's friend (who gave him the laptop) connected him with a math teacher turned entrepreneur who ran a small software development company.
first_role.how_he_got_it: Asked his friend for the contact number and successfully scored an internship at the small Braamfontein-based company.
first_role.significance: First professional software development experience, worked while completing his IT diploma

second_role.position: System Automator specializing in Web Development / One-man IT Team
second_role.how_he_found_it: Found an ad on Gumtree (not LinkedIn or Facebook) as his final academic year was ending in 2019. Met with one of the two founding partners.
second_role.company_context: Small company (less than 6 people when he started) specializing in engineering, not tech. Lebo was the only person with a tech background.
responsibilities: Full IT infrastructure: server installation and setup
On-site support: traveling to clients to help with queries and issues
Web application development: building apps for engineering/manufacturing clients to capture data from various production processes

challenges.no_senior_support: Only developer on the team - no senior to mentor or guide him despite having very little experience
challenges.high_expectations: Everything had to run smoothly all the time
challenges.covid_context: Started during COVID-19 restrictions (2019/20/21), had to travel from client to client despite lockdowns
challenges.learning_curve: Hectic introduction to the industry as a full-time employee

second_role.client_work: Built web applications for engineering companies specializing in production/manufacturing to help them capture data from various processes
second_role.assessment: Enjoyable but challenging work. Wore many hats - from infrastructure to development to on-site support.

third_role.motivation: After almost 3 years at Prolifix, wanted something more challenging. Grew up in Gauteng and had never been outside the province. Believed Cape Town was the Silicon Valley of South Africa since every major tech company has HQ there.
third_role.how_he_got_it: Applied through a talent agent who revamped his resume and connected him with the company
third_role.experience: Great fit when he started. Transitioned from an engineering-focused company to fintech.
third_role.departure_reason: Had to return home to Gauteng to attend to family issues. Left to be present for family while continuing his career.

current_role_detail.how_he_got_it: Found via OfferZen. While handling family matters at home, he completed a profile on OfferZen because he needed to continue working. Interview rounds were a smooth success and he received a letter of employment.
current_role_detail.admission: Had never heard of LexisNexis before applying
current_role_detail.work_focus: AI-enabled capabilities, Python-heavy backend work, integrations
current_role_detail.career_progression_summary: From web development intern → engineering company (one-man IT team) → fintech → global legal tech doing AI work
